resources.string: Hello Player! Welcome to Crillork Code! This is a game from medival era, your objective is to unlock all levels by finding the code to unlock each level. To do that you will need to solve riddles, cyphers and codes. It is not going to be easy , but the secrets lying deep inside the app in the very last page is worth the while, comeon , give it a try :) Nothing to loose for tryingâ€¦ Best of Luck Player !
